tool.name: pRESTOr AbSeq3 Report
tool.description: Create HTML QC report from pRESTO outputs
tool.command: ln -s '$qual1' ./quality-1_table.tab && ln -s '$qual2' ./quality-2_table.tab && ln -s '$primer1' ./primers-1_table.tab && ln -s '$primer2' ./primers-2_table.tab && ln -s '$cons1' ./consensus-1_table.tab && ln -s '$cons2' ./consensus-2_table.tab && ln -s '$assemble' ./assemble_table.tab && ln -s '$maskqual' ./maskqual_table.tab && ln -s '$cregion' ./cregion_table.tab && Rscript '${prestor_script}'

configfiles.configfile: library(prestor) report_abseq3('.', sample='${sample}', output_dir='.', output_file='report.html', format='html')

param.name: sample
param.label: Sample Name
param.help: Sample Name. Must not contain spaces.

validator.message: Value may include alphanumeric characters, underscores and spaces.

param.name: qual1
param.label: ParseLog of FilterSeq(R1)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from FilterSeq on Read 1.

param.name: qual2
param.label: ParseLog of FilterSeq(R2)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from FilterSeq on Read 2.

param.name: primer1
param.label: ParseLog of MaskPrimers(R1)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from MaskPrimers on Read 1.

param.name: primer2
param.label: ParseLog of MaskPrimers(R2)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from MaskPrimers on Read 2.

param.name: cons1
param.label: ParseLog of BuildConsensus(R1)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from BuildConsensus on Read 1.

param.name: cons2
param.label: ParseLog of BuildConsensus(R2)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from BuildConsensus on Read 2.

param.name: assemble
param.label: ParseLog of AssemblePairs
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from AssemblePairs.

param.name: maskqual
param.label: ParseLog of FilterSeq(pairs)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from FilterSeq on the consensus reads.

param.name: cregion
param.label: ParseLog of MaskPrimers(pairs)
param.help: Output of running ParseLog on the log file from MaskPrimers for the C Region.

tool.help: Creates an HTML QC report from the log files generated when running pRESTO.
